powerstations.name: Power Station 1
powerstations.description: Panipat Thermal Power Station I is located at Khukhrana Panipat in Haryana. The power plant is one of the coal based power plants of HPGCL

powerstations.name: Solar Power Station A
powerstations.description: Solar Power Station A is located in a sunny region in California. It harnesses the power of the sun to generate electricity, providing clean and sustainable energy to the region.

powerstations.name: Wind Energy Farm B
powerstations.description: Wind Energy Farm B is situated on the windy plains of Texas. It features a collection of wind turbines that generate electricity from the power of the wind, contributing to a greener future.

powerstations.name: Hydroelectric Power Station C
powerstations.description: Hydroelectric Power Station C is nestled in the mountains of British Columbia, Canada. It harnesses the power of flowing water to generate clean and sustainable electricity.

powerstations.name: Geothermal Power Plant D
powerstations.description: Geothermal Power Plant D is located in the geologically active region of Iceland. It taps into the Earth's natural heat to produce environmentally friendly electricity.
